testcase.system-out: Given To launch the chrome browser and maximise window......................passed When To launch the url of amazon app........................................passed And To click the login button...............................................passed And To pass the valid email in email field..................................passed And To pass the password in password field..................................passed And To click signin button..................................................passed Then To close the browser...................................................passed
